scripts.start: concurrently "node index.js" "cd client && yarn && yarn start"

scripts.dev-concurrently: concurrently "nodemon index.js" "cd client && yarn && yarn start"
scripts.start-concurrently: concurrently "node index.js" "cd client && yarn && yarn start"
